Action: Go to the associate editor "Applications Assigned to You" search
Select an application that is not in the "Accepted" or "Rejected" state, and click "Review application"
Expected Test Results:
* The associate editor view application form is displayed
* "Unlock and Close" is available on the top right
* A "SAVE" button is available
* Application Status and Subject Classification sections are available
* The main application form questions are available
* The Notes section is available

Action: Assign one or more subject classifications.  Expand the tree and look for values below the top level
Make a superficial modification to the application metadata
Click "Add new note" and enter some text into the new note textarea

Expected Test Results:
* A flash message tells you "Application updated" or you are scrolled down to a question which has an answer missing.
* (Choose an answer for the empty questions)
* The changes you applied have been saved
* The page closes, and you are able to return to the search interface
